name: Zomby
description: '''Zomby''' is a British [[electronic music]]ian who began releasing music in 2007. He has released music on several labels, including [[Hyperdub]], [[Werk Discs]], and [[4AD]]. Zomby's influences include [[oldschool jungle]] music and [[Wiley (rapper)|Wiley]]'s [[Grime music#Eskibeat|eskibeat]] sound.
